thread.title: John Lei

author: John Lei
title: John Lei
text: We were looking to travel through Europe by train, but found it to be quite expensive. For less than a third of the cost, we could road trip our way through instead. More freedom and fun, less hassle. Rentalcars.com is an easy site to navigate. I'm a senior and it doesn't take much to trip me up. I picked out a car with great gas mileage easily and hopefully I won't have to accept a lesser substitute when I get there. It went very quickly! Loved it!
